about_the_game:
The earth is being attacked by creatures from deep space! Earth's last remaining scientists have reverse engineered several ships from the their technology. Time to bring the fight back into space! You are humanity's last hope!

Gamma Zero is an old school arcade vertical shmup. Be aggressive and rack up massive multipliers by collecting pickups as fast as possible.

Features:

  • 3 stages of action as you take the fight from to edge of space to the invaders' base

  • 3 ships with unique gun types

  • 3 difficulties

  • Boss rush mode

  • Pickup chaining scoring system

  • Unlock new ship colors

  • Many screen rotation options, designed with Tate mode in mind
detailed_description:
The earth is being attacked by creatures from deep space! Earth's last remaining scientists have reverse engineered several ships from the their technology. Time to bring the fight back into space! You are humanity's last hope!

Gamma Zero is an old school arcade vertical shmup. Be aggressive and rack up massive multipliers by collecting pickups as fast as possible.

Features:

  • 3 ships with unique gun types

  • 3 difficulties

  • Boss rush mode

  • Pickup chaining scoring system

  • Unlock new ship colors

  • Many screen rotation options, designed with Tate mode in mind

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu/Debian/SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu/Debian/SteamOS
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Gamma Zero Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: The earth is being attacked by creatures from deep space! Time to bring the fight back to them! Battle through multiple stages of heart pounding bullet hell action. Evade the onslaught of bullets, rack up massive multipliers, and get revenge for your planet!
